Text: I did walk to the shop. The shop was open until four in the afternoon.
It's no big deal to have a woman in the White House. John F. Kennedy had a thousand of them.
Notes: Taken from Joan Rivers, CNN Spotlight

Text: Things would take a dramatic turn for life on Earth. Our atmosphere found itself being filled with never before seen levels of oxygen..
Following the investigation into the murder of thirty three year old John Doe, police have a new suspect. Forty two year old James P. has been taken into custody for further questioning

When we look around us, we are surrounded by an advanced society, filled with complex life and complex structures. While we have never seen this outside of our home planet, we might wonder whether there is another planet out there which could support our lifestyle.
